questions: Give the features of kingdom protista.
answers: (i) Slime moulds are both plant and animal like. (ii) They are plant like in the production of spores during reproduction and animal like in the mode of nutrition. (iii) Their somatic structures consist of wall-less, multinucleate mobile mass of protoplasm called plasmodium. (iv) They absorb nutrients directly substratum. (v) The reproductive stage consists of sporangia and spores formed after meiosis.

questions: What is the nature of cell wall in diatoms ?
answers: (i) In diatoms, the cell walls form two thin overlapping shells which fit together as in a soap box. (ii) Their walls are embedded with silica making it indestructible.
